concept.title: Additional Kafka Properties
concept.shortdesc: You can add custom Kafka configuration properties to the Kafka Multitopic Consumer.

conbody.p: additional propertiesKafka Multitopic ConsumerKafka Multitopic Consumer originadditional propertiesWhen you add the Kafka configuration property, enter the exact property name and the value. The Kafka Multitopic Consumer does not validate the property names or values.

p.note:
The Kafka Multitopic Consumer origin uses the following Kafka configuration properties. The origin ignores user-defined values for these properties:
auto.commit.interval.ms
bootstrap.servers
enable.auto.commit
group.id
max.poll.records
